channel.title: Server wont save char after login and logout
channel.description: yes my server wont save my char after i login then logout can anyone help me with either a save command or helping me figure out whats up its a firescape source thanks alot

item.title: Server wont save char after login and logout
item.dc:creator: @slayerofevil slayerofevil
item.description:
@slayerofevil wrote:

it is rsc and any source i use it just wont save to the sql it reads fine omg i just figured it out my root isnt setup to write to sql duh hold on lemme try that and ill post results[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 16, 2008, 06:28:19 am[/size][hr]still the same anyone have any ideas

item.title: Server wont save char after login and logout
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I couldn’t be totally sure whether this should be closed or not, as I think I have seen an RSC private server called FireScape aswell… But if you, slayerofevil, could verify whether it is RuneScape (2) or RuneScape Classic you are using, then please do so.
